Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: Exhilarating \Ex*hil"a*ra`ting\, a. That exhilarates; cheering; gladdening. -- {Ex*hil"a*ra`ting*ly}, adv. [1913 Webster]
exhilarating adj 1: making lively and cheerful; "the exhilarating effect of mountain air" [syn: {stimulating}] 2: making lively and joyful [syn: {elating}]
